attributes.action: Allow motorcycle tests through covid as you are on separate vehicles
attributes.additional_details: You are on separate vehicles and when the first lockdown ended you allowed car driving tests but not motorcycle tests, you extended a select few people's CBT's however myself being someone who has been waiting to do my A2 motorcycle test since March and hasn't been able to as they haven't been allowed to do them since before the first lockdown and now my ,along with many others, CBT's have run out adding a huge cost to the A2 or other test prices.
attributes.background: Allow motorcycle tests to be taken through covid, CBT, A1, A2, A class licenses.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Exclude all motorcycle training and examinations from any Covid-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558548
